mapper.sql: MERCHANT_ID, MERCHANT_NAME, MERCHANT_SCENIC_SPOT_ID, CERT_FILE_NAME, MERCHANT_SECRET, MERCHANT_NUMBER, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE
mapper.insert: insert into WECHAT_BUSINESS_MANAGEMENT (MERCHANT_ID, MERCHANT_NAME, MERCHANT_SCENIC_SPOT_ID, CERT_FILE_NAME, MERCHANT_SECRET, MERCHANT_NUMBER, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE) values (#{merchantId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{merchantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantScenicSpotId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{certFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantSecret,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into WECHAT_BUSINESS_MANAGEMENT
MERCHANT_ID,
MERCHANT_NAME,
MERCHANT_SCENIC_SPOT_ID,
CERT_FILE_NAME,
MERCHANT_SECRET,
MERCHANT_NUMBER,
CREATE_DATE,
UPDATE_DATE,

mapper.update:
update WECHAT_BUSINESS_MANAGEMENT
MERCHANT_NAME = #{merchantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MERCHANT_SCENIC_SPOT_ID = #{merchantScenicSpotId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CERT_FILE_NAME = #{certFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MERCHANT_SECRET = #{merchantSecret,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MERCHANT_NUMBER = #{merchantNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where MERCHANT_ID = #{merchantId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update WECHAT_BUSINESS_MANAGEMENT set MERCHANT_NAME = #{merchantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MERCHANT_SCENIC_SPOT_ID = #{merchantScenicSpotId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CERT_FILE_NAME = #{certFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MERCHANT_SECRET = #{merchantSecret,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MERCHANT_NUMBER = #{merchantNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where MERCHANT_ID = #{merchantId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from WECHAT_BUSINESS_MANAGEMENT ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT A.MERCHANT_ID, A.MERCHANT_NAME, A.MERCHANT_SCENIC_SPOT_ID, A.CERT_FILE_NAME, A.MERCHANT_SECRET, A.MERCHANT_NUMBER, A.CREATE_DATE, A.UPDATE_DATE FROM WECHAT_BUSINESS_MANAGEMENT A LEFT JOIN SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_CERTIFICATE_SPOT B ON A.MERCHANT_ID = B.CERTIFICATE_ID
B.SCENIC_SPOT_ID = #{orderScenicSpotId}

SELECT A.MERCHANT_ID, A.MERCHANT_NAME, A.MERCHANT_SCENIC_SPOT_ID, A.CERT_FILE_NAME, A.MERCHANT_SECRET, A.MERCHANT_NUMBER, A.CREATE_DATE, A.UPDATE_DATE FROM WECHAT_BUSINESS_MANAGEMENT A
A.CERT_FILE_NAME = #{filename}
